Comment: The response provides a comprehensive explanation of the term "Holy One" in both the Old and New Testaments, highlighting the distinctiveness and moral purity associated with this title. The connection between the authority and divinity of Jesus as the "Holy One" in the New Testament is effectively explored through relevant scriptural references, demonstrating Jesus' sinlessness and His unique relationship with God. The discussion effectively integrates Christian theology and worldview to support the significance of Jesus as the "Holy One."
